title: ERROR sync: Failed to handle p2p pubsub error=one or more attestation signatures did not verify

This is expected. Block at slot 233 was a bad block and it got rejected. This is not a client error.

It's not included in the chain:
https://beaconcha.in/block/233
https://beaconscan.com/slot/233
